name: Tale Of Fallen Leaf
description:
The nursing summer has gone. And autumn has started. Before the winter, the trees need to shed their leaves again. So we can mix it into the soil and make the upcoming spring beautiful. It's a story about being alive and enjoying every moment with the children. Who is who, and who appreciates the lovely? leaves fountain in the jungle. least desire to see? The children smiled again. and playing with them. Let's see the story. How do you say goodbye to this autumn?

TreeStudios Universe · tale of fallen leaf
